title: Sampler, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: satin and cross stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 31 x 25 cm (12 3/16 x 9 13/16 in.)

description: Five cross borders with flowers, animals, and birds.  Signature "Mary Strod is my name."
